mapper.select: SELECT A.UID AS UID,SAS_DCL_NO AS SASDCLNO,ACMP_FORM_SEQNO AS ACMPFORMSEQNO, CHG_TMS_CNT AS CHGTMSCNT,B.ATTR_NAME AS FORMTYPECD,FORM_NO AS FORMNO, FIXD_NO AS FIXDNO,ACMP_FORM_FILE_NM AS ACMPFORMFILENM,RMK AS RMK, VERSION AS VERSION,ETPS_PREENT_NO AS ETPSPREENTNO,ACMP_FORM_FILE_SIZE AS acmpFormFileSize, SEQ_NO AS SEQNO FROM SAS_DCL_ACMP_FORM_DT A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES B ON B.ATTR_VALUE = A.FORM_TYPECD AND B.DICTIONARY_VALUE='ACMP_FORM_TYPECD' WHERE A.SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE SAS_DCL_ACMP_FORM_DT SET ACMP_FORM_SEQNO = ACMP_FORM_SEQNO - 1 WHERE SEQ_NO = #{seqNo} AND ACMP_FORM_SEQNO > #{acmpFormSeqno}
